ygData.subject: Re: High Hold Pass
ygData.msgSnippet: The bank is in the basement of the keep, don t open any doors down there.... The pets are also in the keep, on the main floor, to the left as you come in, I
ygData.messageBody:
The bank is in the basement of the keep, don't open any doors down there....
The pets are also in the keep, on the main floor, to the left as you come
in, I think.

-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert <robert.farr@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 23, 1999 11:21 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] High Hold Pass


>
>I have recently acheived level 8 and would like to be able
>to summon a pet that doesn't con green to me. I have been
>told that the only place to get Mircyl's Animation is in High
>Hold Keep. I know the way is treacherous, and am asking for
>help from my fellow enchanters. Attached below is a map of
>High Hold Pass that I got off of one of the most incredible EQ
>map sites I have seen to date. Unfortunately, almost everything
>on the site is in Japanese. If one of you who has made the trip
>could mark the path to take from Kithicor to the bank, then to
>the vendor who sells the spells and maybe annotate a few
>things to watch out for (like the prisoners past the bank), I, along
>with all the up-and-coming enchanters out there, would be
>very appreciative.
>
>

>Oh, here is the link to that webisite...
>
> http://www2s.biglobe.ne.jp/~hakata/eq/index2.html
>
>Thank you in advance...
>
>Qinie, 8th circle Enchantress
>Mithaniel Marr server
>
